org.springframework.orm.hibernate
Class HibernateTransactionObject

java.lang.Object
  org.springframework.jdbc.datasource.JdbcTransactionObjectSupport
      org.springframework.orm.hibernate.HibernateTransactionObject
All Implemented Interfaces:
SavepointManager, SmartTransactionObject
public class HibernateTransactionObject
extends JdbcTransactionObjectSupport

Hibernate transaction object, representing a SessionHolder. Used as transaction object by HibernateTransactionManager.

Derives from JdbcTransactionObjectSupport to inherit the capability to manage JDBC 3.0 Savepoints for underlying JDBC Connections.

Note: This is an SPI class, not intended to be used by applications.

Since:
02.05.2003
Author:
Juergen Hoeller
See Also:
HibernateTransactionManager, SessionHolder

isRollbackOnly

public boolean isRollbackOnly()
Description copied from interface: SmartTransactionObject
Return whether the transaction is internally marked as rollback-only. Can, for example, check the JTA UserTransaction.

See Also:
UserTransaction.getStatus(), Status.STATUS_MARKED_ROLLBACK
